attributes.action: Allow the revocation of Baptism under a freely accessible law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to the Church, Baptism is a lifelong spiritual mark. However, as it can be removed by an Act of Parliament, Baptism doesn't appear to be -too- permanent. Not all who are baptised choose it ie. infants, but are bound by it for the rest of their lives. Those who have relinquished their beliefs or are converting to another faith may wish to escape the constrictions of Ecclesiastical law.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
